10.13. Fortran Bindings for Environmental Inquiry


Up: Language Binding Next: Fortran Bindings for Profiling Previous: Fortran Bindings for Process Topologies

MPI_GET_PROCESSOR_NAME(NAME, RESULTLEN, IERROR)
CHARACTER*(*) NAME
INTEGER RESULTLEN, IERROR
MPI_ERRHANDLER_CREATE(FUNCTION, HANDLER, IERROR)
EXTERNAL FUNCTION
INTEGER ERRHANDLER, IERROR
MPI_ERRHANDLER_SET(COMM, ERRHANDLER, IERROR)
INTEGER COMM, ERRHANDLER, IERROR
MPI_ERRHANDLER_GET(COMM, ERRHANDLER, IERROR)
INTEGER COMM, ERRHANDLER, IERROR
MPI_ERRHANDLER_FREE(ERRHANDLER, IERROR)
INTEGER ERRHANDLER, IERROR
MPI_ERROR_STRING(ERRORCODE, STRING, RESULTLEN, IERROR)
INTEGER ERRORCODE, RESULTLEN, IERROR
CHARACTER*(*) STRING
MPI_ERROR_CLASS(ERRORCODE, ERRORCLASS, IERROR)
INTEGER ERRORCODE, ERRORCLASS, IERROR
DOUBLE PRECISION MPI_WTIME()
DOUBLE PRECISION MPI_WTICK()
MPI_INIT(IERROR)
INTEGER IERROR
MPI_FINALIZE(IERROR)
INTEGER IERROR
MPI_INITIALIZED(FLAG, IERROR)
LOGICAL FLAG
INTEGER IERROR
MPI_ABORT(COMM, ERRORCODE, IERROR)
INTEGER COMM, ERRORCODE, IERROR
